Articles.Content:
[Removed spam link.]

There is a link to a spam website copying forum articles to get more clicks and ad money, this has already been established in other threads. What I came here for was this; I want to know where the forum equivalent of this is. It doesn't show up on Google Search or here, on Google there's only the copy by Mr. Profiting Off Of The Best Community Ever. I want to find this because I'm using it's info in a youtube video and I want to credit it. So yeah, that's all I have to say. Cheers, Raincrafter.

Edited October 24, 2015 by sal_vager

You mean this by our very own daniel l. ?

I'm not clicking that link to check as I don't want to give that guy my traffic, and I'll remove the link too.
Thank You! Now I will put the one by daniel l. in the vid. Cheers, Raincrafter.
